div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1097 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), 1909 Burial: c. 275-225 B.C. Contents: 46 AE. In amphora Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 32-33, some ctmk. with tripod; Zograph, pl. 43, 19) Disposition: museum material lost during war â€ Shkorpil, IAK 47 (1913), p. 6, no. 10 Shelov, MIA 33 (1954), p. 68
